StoryText: My wife texts me and asks me to print something out for her at my office but I just left work.
Question: What do I do?

OptionText.Text: Turn around and print her stuff out
Just print it out when I go into the office tomorrow
Stop by at an office supply store and print her stuff out there
Ask her to just print it out at the office supply store herself

OptionResult.Result: My wife thanks me but I get stuck in traffic on the way back which is annoying. But I have time to listen to an audiobook of mine.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: My wife was very happy with me for actually turning back around to print her stuff out but I am annoyed with all the traffic I got stuck in. Took forever to get home, the plus side is that I got to listen to my audiobook finally.

OptionResult.Result: I print the stuff out the next day but my boss sees me and lectures me about using the company printer for personal things.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I should’ve just printed her stuff out earlier! My wife is happy that I did this favor for her but things are rocky with my boss now after he caught me using the printer for personal reasons.

OptionResult.Result: When I get to the office store someone comes in and robs the place and me! My wife gets mad I didn’t print her stuff out.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: It’s bad enough I got robbed at the office supply store but then my wife actually is angry with me for not printing her stuff out! I was trying to, it’s not my fault I didn’t get to... unbelievable!

OptionResult.Result: My wife is annoyed that I make her do it and doesn’t talk to me when I get home. But then I get a chance to listen to my audiobook.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: My wife gets annoyed that I make her print her own stuff out but I didn’t feel like turning around. It was quiet at home so I got to listen to my audiobook... but I hope it doesn’t stay this quiet in the house for too long...
